data.name: Commercial Variable - Commercially Secured IO
data.description: Apply to pay interest only for up to 5 years of the total term on your business loan.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.
Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

features.additionalInfo: Maximum loan repayment term 15 years. During the overall maximum term, loans can have a fixed rate and or pay interest only for a specified portion (1,2,3 or 5 years) of the overall term.
No on-going fees.  With no annual or monthly account keeping fees you can save money for the other important things in your life.
Reach your property goal sooner.  Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager
Enjoy free redraw.  Access your additional business loan repayments with redraw, so you can use it whenever you need some breathing space.

fees.name: Arrears letter fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable upfront where an independent property valuer nominated by Great Southern Bank must provide a market value on the security property offered.

fees.name: Default notice fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Securities Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each security offered to Great Southern Bank for the business loan.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: $750 irrespective of loan amount.  An establishment fee includes the cost of processing the application and the preparation of loan documentation.

fees.name: Redocumentation or Variation  Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the security held for the loan is to be substituted for another property.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is out of order.

fees.name: Discharge Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when the security held for the loan is to be released and the account closed.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a title held by Great Southern Bank has to be presented to the state's land titles office for any purpose.
